snippet: The re-election bid by State Senator Roy J. McDonald has become a referendum on one issue: his decision to vote to legalize same-sex marriage.
abstract: Re-election bid by New York State Senator Roy J McDonald, Republican from Saratoga, has become a referendum on his decision to vote to legalize same-sex marriage; McDonald and two other Republicans are trying to survive primary challenges from fellow Republicans.
lead_paragraph: The re-election bid by State Senator Roy J. McDonald has become a referendum on one issue: his decision to vote to legalize same-sex marriage.

headline.seo: After Vote for Gay Marriage, Senator Roy McDonald Faces G.O.P. Primary Fight
headline.main: Gay Marriage Vote Rises as Test in Upstate G.O.P. Race
headline.print_headline: Vote for Gay Marriage Rises As Test in Upstate G.O.P. Race

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
